title: Fernando Po swift
text:
The Fernando Po swift ("Apus sladeniae") is a species of <a href="Swift%20%28bird%29">swift</a> in the family <a href="Apodidae">Apodidae</a>.
It is found in <a href="Angola">Angola</a>, <a href="Cameroon">Cameroon</a>, <a href="Equatorial%20Guinea">Equatorial Guinea</a>, and <a href="Nigeria">Nigeria</a>.
The specific epithet is for <a href="Constance%20Sladen">Constance Sladen</a>, who provided financial support for its discovery.
